website_summaries.verdict: This adorable floating treasure chest comes with 6 pieces of sinking "treasure" for your little ones to retrieve.
pros: Kids dive to pick up treasure-shaped sinkers and deposit them in the floating treasure chest
Includes play ideas for a variety of games in and out of the water
Sturdy plastic construction and fade-resistant colors stand up to chlorine and sun exposure
cons: The gems do not fit through the slot at the top of the chest
you must open it to put them in, which is challenging for small children

customer_reviews.title: Sinking floatable dive toy
customer_reviews.text: Melissa and Doug is typically my go to toy. My 5 year old loves to swim, what girl doesn’t love gem hunting?? Well, M & D this is one of the very few things I am totally disappointed in. The gems don’t fit in the slot, only the coins. I bought other gems/coins for a fraction of the price to use with it. Then the chest takes in water and sinks. So if you are looking for a complete dive kit, you are in luck. If you are looking for a floatable receptacle to put the gems/coins in, keep on trucking. The description is deceiving. M & D you can do better than this toy.
customer_reviews.author: JYeater2

customer_reviews.title: My sons 3 and 5 love this chest and diving for treasure
customer_reviews.text: My sons 3 and 5 love this chest and diving for treasure. Just wished you can buy more the same coins and jewels. They are amazing quality comparing to the rest of companies selling the same stuff. They give you more “treasure” but quality is so bad comparing to Mellisa. I would be willing to pay extra for more if Mellisa treasure!
customer_reviews.author: Marci

customer_reviews.title: I can't wait to purchase for a gift idea.
customer_reviews.text: I love it, the numbers and details on the coins, the color jewels. They all sink to the bottom of pool for diving age kids. My 9 month old held a coin while three 3-year old girls each played with one or two pieces at a pool party. This toy is good for children from 9 months and up, parents can interact by diving for the treasure. Great gift idea for kids who play in pools or take long baths.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Ayala

customer_reviews.title: Endless fun
customer_reviews.text: I use these to motivate children in the pool! It is an WINNER of a toy! My only feedback is it could do with more coins and gems in the set! 6 is not enough! It is too much fun for only 6! I bought some others from another supplier to make up for it! The kids Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Lucy G.

customer_reviews.title: Product Not as described
customer_reviews.text: I specially purchased this because it advertised that the treasure chest floats, well that is a lie ! We just recently got a pool and my daughter needed something that could hold her diving things while she retrieved the other ones. I thought what a cute idea.... treasure chest and gems and coins!!! Nope ! Because of the coin colors it’s really hard to see in the water. ( My pool is very clean ) And like I mentioned, the treasure chest sunk within a minute! I mean it was super fast and it was under water. Why advertise something that is not true?!? Don’t waste your money !
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Love this toy
customer_reviews.text: Only issue is there is not enough treasure inside. Like other reviewers mentioned, there should be a few more treasure coins or gems. Kids loved this, my 3 yr old, 5 yr old and 9 year old all had a blast playing with these. Our first trip to pool it got over an hour of steady play, however, one of the silver coins got lost and after 1 hr of searching (big pool) we gave up. There are already so few coins, my son was VERY disappointed he had even less now. Toy is well made.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonmom

customer_reviews.title: Fun water toy for kids
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old niece really enjoyed this...had a lot of fun diving for the coins and gems. It’s a nice size and the pieces are well made and cute. I gave it 4 stars because it wouldn’t float straight up....it kind of went backwards somewhat with the octopus on top going back into the water. My niece was a little frustrated with that at first but then she got over it pretty quick.
customer_reviews.author: Jake Fain

customer_reviews.title: Cute and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: My son adores this toy! We bought it to use for a birthday party treasure hunt but now he uses it to carry around his little toys. He loves having his special treasure with him. He even puts it in his bike basket to take to on rides with him. It's very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Zula

customer_reviews.title: Cute but needs more treasure
customer_reviews.text: I would have given this product 5 stars except it doesn't come with enough coins or gems! And I can't find anywhere to buy them separate. But overall it's a super cute toy. My kids liked it I think. It doesnt stay sunk at the bottom of a pool like some reviewers said.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica

customer_reviews.title: Great diving set for toddlers
customer_reviews.text: I love anything Melissa and Doug and this did not disappoint! The perfect diving set for 4 and 5 year olds! The parts are not too little and the chest is the perfect size to float on top of the water. Can’t wait to use it this summer.
customer_reviews.author: AshleyP

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs way up
customer_reviews.text: It was larger and better than I expected it to be. Sturdy little treasure box with all the details. Coins are playable and large. Numbers and lot of learning opportunities . gems have holes for draining too i give this a way up thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal O'Gane

customer_reviews.title: Love this set
customer_reviews.text: Love this set. Great for tge pool or bath. Love thst tge treasure chest drains. Great set. I even found more diving jewels and gave a set to our neighbor for his newpool.😊 I bought a set for my daughter last year and its her favorite bath toy.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas A. Chapin

customer_reviews.title: Not ideal for sharing
customer_reviews.text: Six total coins/gems- a little disappointed you can’t even buy extras if you wanted to. Durable. Curious as to why the hole isn’t big enough to fit the gems in. My kid enjoy diving for the coins, just wish there were a couple more.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Meh...
customer_reviews.text: The paint on the octopus and chest started coming off within the first TEN MINUTES of play. I wish there were more pieces, and I wish the coins were shinier.
customer_reviews.author: AUTUMN

customer_reviews.title: Best toddler pool entertainment ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 2 year old to play with in the shallow side of our pool and am so glad I did. It entertains her for hours. She just loves collecting her "treasures". It is a cute toy for younger kids.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Fun idea, but not really functional.
customer_reviews.text: My kid loves the idea of a treasure chest, but the jewels don't fit in the slot at the top so you have to physically open the box to put those inside of it. It'd be nice to have more than 3-4 coins and jewels that fit into the slot.
customer_reviews.author: shopgirl

customer_reviews.title: Best toy of our Summer purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Would give this a 10 star if I could. Everyone asks where this came from at the pool. All kids are attracted to its design and fun use at the pool.
customer_reviews.author: DJL

customer_reviews.title: Great for pools!
customer_reviews.text: My girls love this toy! My in-laws have a pool and we bought to play with there. The treasure chest sinks and they love to put toys in it that do not sink, so that they actually do. If that makes sense. All the toys sink as well. So it is great to help children learn to dive and go to the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Honeycutt

customer_reviews.title: Favorited pool toy and great value!
customer_reviews.text: As a swim teacher, I’ve bought many pool toys over the years, but my students love this toy the best. I wish it came with more than 4 coins, but still a GREAT buy!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Great for any age
customer_reviews.text: These were used at swim lessons so I bought some for our pool at home. We put the coins on the steps which help toddlers learn to hold their breath and put their face in the water while also having fun. My older kids also play with them as well to dive for.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Great water toy!
customer_reviews.text: This is always a hit at the pool! We have had this for a few years now and it's still in great shape. Now I buy them as gifts for our friends that have younger children.
customer_reviews.author: AZ Mommy

customer_reviews.title: Great bath toy!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent bath toy! My kids love the coins and being able to put them in the chest. The. Pins sink so they must be retrieved from the bottom of the tub which is fun. My kids love the gems. Great toy in and out of the bath. Nice big coins so. I worry about choking.
customer_reviews.author: Prounce

customer_reviews.title: Quality price and fast shipment
customer_reviews.text: For a gift so has not been put to use yet Shipping was fast. Nice sturdy product Wish there were more coins and jewelry to it
customer_reviews.author: momlove

customer_reviews.title: Fun pool toy but POOR quality and design
customer_reviews.text: Kids have fun with it but other reviewers are correct after 1 use the paint comes off plus the supplied gems fit DO NOT through the slot at the top for kids to put them back in, only the supplies coins.
customer_reviews.author: Solange Clarke

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not super durable
customer_reviews.text: Love this box and it’s super cute. The only issue is the top of the octopus chipped a ton the first time we took it to the pool.
customer_reviews.author: lisonbizzle

customer_reviews.title: just ok
customer_reviews.text: Well, this was larger than expected. But I'm not impressed. The paint is worn off the octopus on one use. The gems are flat. The treasure box does float. The kids are having more fun trying to find ways to actually sink the treasure box....or playing with it outside the pool and putting other household treasure in. Its OK, not super great, wouldn't order again, but its not falling apart or totally defective.
customer_reviews.author: R. F. Payton

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but the gems don't fit in the slot
customer_reviews.text: This is a great toy, with one exception. My son loves putting the coins into the chest, but the green and red gems don't fit through the slot. For the age this toy is aimed at, I could see that these two extra pieces are a little confusing for them. We just tuck the gems away and let him focus on the coins. Other than that, he loves this toy. (Age 2)
customer_reviews.author: Wendy H.

customer_reviews.title: Cute chest
customer_reviews.text: The paint chipped off of the top right away. The kids liked the gold coins they loved diving for them.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia Clay

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This is a fun toy. Every time we go to the pool we make new "friends" because all the kids are drawn to it and want to play with it. :) I like that I can take it to the kiddie pool and have the little kids play with it, but when I take it to the big pool, kids ages 15 on down want to play with it/dive for the coins and jewels. It really is a fun toy for any age group! A little on the pricier side, but we've used it so much I don't mind at this point.
customer_reviews.author: Peeshka

customer_reviews.title: Good, kid ool fun.
customer_reviews.text: Lots of pool fun. Coins are numbers but easily lost. Little kids can throw coins in pool for big kids to find.
customer_reviews.author: rjh

customer_reviews.title: Good quality but small
customer_reviews.text: My new swimmer loves this and it really is cute. However I wish it floated better instead of toppling onto its back side.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for summer!
customer_reviews.text: I have an 8 and 9 year old and they loved this toy! I was worried it would be too young for them, but the loved diving for the “treasure”. Love love Melissa and Doug products!
customer_reviews.author: jen

customer_reviews.title: A treasured toy
customer_reviews.text: Kids love it! They dive for the “jewels” and play pirates . A great fun toy pool or out of pool. Drains easily and easy to reattach the lid if “pirates are too rough.
customer_reviews.author: Paula Monsarrat

customer_reviews.title: It’s bigger than most treasure chest and made really well!
customer_reviews.text: It was a little pricy but perfect for earning points with my grandkids for doing well at school
customer_reviews.author: Mary E. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great for the pool
customer_reviews.text: Both my sons 2.5 and 5 loved these. The 5 year old loves for me to throw them and he dives for them. They both love to put them in the treasure box. The coins fit in the slot and the jewels you have to open to put inside the box. This is well made. The box also floats which is cool.
customer_reviews.author: SMP

customer_reviews.title: Cute toy
customer_reviews.text: My son is into pirates right now. I bring this in the pool with us. It’s good Quality.
customer_reviews.author: Alissa Dawn Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun, even for younger kids
customer_reviews.text: Really cute and very durable. The pieces are large enough to spot in the water and grab easily, even for younger swimmers. Better yet, several pieces spent the entire summer at the bottom of the pool and didn't discolor in anyway. The treasure chest floats pretty well, which is an additional perk. Girls loved the "ruby" and "emerald".
customer_reviews.author: LucysMama

customer_reviews.title: Grand daughters and pirate gold
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my grand daughter who loves to wear a mask and dive for things in our community pool. She thinks she is going after pirate treasure. They say the chest will float but it will sink if you grand daughter takes it under water and it fills with water. She is seven and this game lasted for hours in the pool. Keep your eye on the coins though because seven year old's can loose things easily. Good product and stands up to rough treatment.
customer_reviews.author: Auby's Hobbies

customer_reviews.title: I love this toy
customer_reviews.text: I love this toy! I know it was meant as a pool toy, but my 2 year just uses it as his treasure chest. Its easyf for him to open and close and to add his gold too. It's very sturdy and has withstood several drops already. Couldnt have gotten a better treasure chest for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Endless fun
customer_reviews.text: The grandkids (2 & 5) can't stop playing with this toy. The chest does tend to sink pretty easily, but the kids just set it on the edge of the pool and are continuously tossing the coins and gems into the pool and diving to retrieve them. Great fun and exercise for them, as well as improving their diving skills.
customer_reviews.author: Randolph S. Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Cute set.
customer_reviews.text: I always look for Melissa and Doug items because they are always good and educational products. Our 4 year old grandson loves finding the treasure in our pool. Likes this a lot better than the standard diving sticks and rings.
customer_reviews.author: laurie matthiae

customer_reviews.title: Treasure Chest
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves this treasure chest. I also bought extra jewels and coins.
customer_reviews.author: arual34433

customer_reviews.title: Cute for class use but not sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for special needs class and not sturdy for our use.
customer_reviews.author: srhow53

customer_reviews.title: Fun toy
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old recently got into diving to the bottom of the pool and he loves this toy. We have to bring it every time we go swimming. The treasure chest sort of floats but if water gets in it will sink after a while. The coins are more difficult to see under water than most dive rings or sticks and they are harder to grab but my son can still get them on his own. It is nice to have variety for dive toys. Sometimes he plays with it out of the water too.
customer_reviews.author: KysMom

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for baby to 9 year old! Fun IN & OUT of the water!
customer_reviews.text: We brought this to an indoor waterpark vacation we usually take along with 2 other families ( kids ranging from baby to 9 years old) and this toy was a big hit. My 14- month old & 3 year old loved playing with the jewels, coins, & treasure box and the older kids loved searching and diving for them ( it also has suggested games for them included with the toy that were fun). Planning to buy another to have this summer since we have played with this outside of the water at home & have misplaced some of the coins & jewels.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki Z

customer_reviews.title: Cute bath and pool toy
customer_reviews.text: This is a cute toy, I wish it came with more coins and jewels, however. It only comes with two jewels and four coins.
customer_reviews.author: Sissy123

customer_reviews.title: It’s Melissa and Doug.
customer_reviews.text: Better quality than I thought it would be. The kids love it.
customer_reviews.author: laughingmoon

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Cute treasure box. I thought it had more coins inside like it looks in the picture but it doesn't. My son loves it either way. We use it for ABA therapy and it works great. Love Melissa & Doug!
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Such a cute toy for the pool, ordered a ...
customer_reviews.text: Such a cute toy for the pool, ordered a second one! Wish the gems and coins were a little larger or easier to see/harder to lose but I don't blame the company for that. My 4 year old that is obsessed with treasure loves this as well as our 6th grader friends that come to swim.
customer_reviews.author: CaMom

customer_reviews.title: Super cute
customer_reviews.text: Well made. Super cute. Perfect for the nephew.. he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: MrsHackworth

customer_reviews.title: We tend to leave the jewels at home because they float away (on the bottom) pretty quickly and our pool is packed
customer_reviews.text: We put all our pool toys into this treasure chest when we take it to the pool. It's always a hit with all the other kids. We have to keep an eye on it or they disappear! We tend to leave the jewels at home because they float away (on the bottom) pretty quickly and our pool is packed. But overall, the kiddo says the best part about this is the treasure chest carrying case!
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it
customer_reviews.text: These are fun for our pool. My 3 year old son likes to "hide" them in different areas of the pool and we all take turns finding them. The coins have numbers on them so it's also fun for him to identify the numbers on the coins as he returns them to the treasure chest. The only downside of this product is I feel like it was a little too expensive for what it is.
customer_reviews.author: k8ekat

customer_reviews.title: A must have water toy for pirate lovers!
customer_reviews.text: As always Melissa & Doug makes a wonderful, durable toy. My son saw this at a friends pool and had to have one for himself. The best thing about the treasure chest is it floats. The coins and jewels sink, but not the chest. You can use it to collect your coins as well as for imaginary pirate or mermaid play, inside and outside the water.
customer_reviews.author: puglover98

customer_reviews.title: Our grandson LOVES this toy!
customer_reviews.text: Our grandson LOVES this toy. It seems like such a simple thing, but he really loves it. We were very happy.
customer_reviews.author: drjim

customer_reviews.title: Son loves it
customer_reviews.text: Our 17 month old played with this toy at a local pool. He loved it so much that I bought him one for Easter. Have yet to play with it in the pool given the circumstances but he loves it in the tub!
customer_reviews.author: Ri

customer_reviews.title: Nice for a pirate lover
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is a huge "Jake and the Neverland Pirates" fan. So we got her this for her to play with. We aren't using it in a pool or tub at least not yet. But it's keeping her interest (she is almost 3). And made well. I am very happy with this and found a "map" to fit inside of it also here on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Jenni

customer_reviews.title: Product arrived damaged. Also, seems a bit overpriced ...
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived damaged. Also, seems a bit overpriced for the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Great pool toy!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my kids to play with in our pool. So far, it has been played with every day. They love throwing out the coins and jewels and diving after them. The container floats even when it gets water in it. No complaints here.
customer_reviews.author: Julia L. Izzolo

customer_reviews.title: It's a hit!
customer_reviews.text: We have a daycare and this has provided us with hours of entertainment. The kids love it. Obviously for older kids because it requires diving down to the bottom, but I also put it in the bath with my three year old and she is happy as can be. The chest floats and the pieces are quality. I would recommended to anyone looking for pool/tub fun!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Swan

customer_reviews.title: They loved it. And many relatives asking where I got ...
customer_reviews.text: A gift for my nephews. They loved it. And many relatives asking where I got it to get for their kids.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Shordt

customer_reviews.title: Good pool toy!
customer_reviews.text: My kids love playing with this toy in the pool. My son is now able to swim under water and love diving for the coins and jewels in this toy. The Treasure Chest floats, so he was able to dive for the treasure, and swim over to the chest to put it in there. This one will be making a re-appearance next summer.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah J. Levin

customer_reviews.title: A great
customer_reviews.text: Our grandkids started playing with them right away. A great present
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Isbell

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The grandchildren love to dive for treasures in the pool.
customer_reviews.author: JoAnna C.

customer_reviews.title: Decent buy
customer_reviews.text: The chest began to chip pretty quickly but it serves it's purpose. I bought additional gems and thebkids love this cheat.
customer_reviews.author: Catalina

customer_reviews.title: This toy is a treasure!
customer_reviews.text: Great buy. My 5&6 yo love this & have spent hours at the pool coming up with various role playing games with it and my 16 mo. old also loves putting the coins in the slot when her older sibs aren't using it. They have added sea shells and other treasures to it over time. When we leave for the pool we just need towels, goggles and the "treasure chest" and we are set!
customer_reviews.author: Pizza Queen

customer_reviews.title: Kids Love It!
customer_reviews.text: My kids play with this set nearly every day. They love searching for treasure on the bottom of the pool, both in the treasure box, and outside of it. The pieces sink easily and are not so small that my 7 and 5 yr old can't locate them on the bottom of the pool.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Newell

customer_reviews.title: The idea is good for this item
customer_reviews.text: The idea is good for this item, but the execution is a little poor. For example, the coins fit perfectly through the slot on the top. The jewels however are much too large which defeats the purpose of having the slot. Also, the treasure chest sinks easily which isn't a huge deal, but a little annoying for a baby pool toy.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Not that fun for kids
customer_reviews.text: This was a great idea in concept but kids didn't want to play with it during our pool party. The chest didn't sink and there were only a few treasures and coins. May be better as a family toy versus something for 7 seven year olds.
customer_reviews.author: Mr_Shush

customer_reviews.title: well received bday gift!
customer_reviews.text: it was a gift for my friends son. it was his 7th birthday. he and his friends loved it, but there has to be a grownup willing to keep throwing those pieces into the pool!
customer_reviews.author: rainbowsky

customer_reviews.title: Fun for kids
customer_reviews.text: Fun for your kids if they are into pirate stuff and diving for treasures in the pool. Only complaint is that the gold paint on the box starts to chip off if left in the sun. Coins are not painted and there is not worry about chipping paint with them.
customer_reviews.author: Yennia

customer_reviews.title: I bought this for my elementary reading class. They ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my elementary reading class. They put play money in it when they bring in a current glossary word from our readers. Not all, but many students are excited when they get to "take the teacher's money!" lol
customer_reviews.author: Suzann

customer_reviews.title: Grandson loves it
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves this treasure chest. LIkes to dive for the treasure when at the pool and play with it in the bathtub.
customer_reviews.author: Anita Murphy

customer_reviews.title: the kids love it. I only knocked off one star because ...
customer_reviews.text: Really cute, the kids love it. I only knocked off one star because it does scratch very easily- I have two little girls who are pretty gentle with toys, and the treasure chest is already all scratched up after one day at the pool. Doesn't bother them though!
customer_reviews.author: Erin Linde

customer_reviews.title: Well thought through and very good for pools
customer_reviews.text: Feels durable and got battered a lot in 1 week but holds well. Kids love it.
customer_reviews.author: cedric colombo

customer_reviews.title: Fun gift for smaller food swimmers!
customer_reviews.text: Fun gift for our grandkids-they love diving down to hunt for treasure!
customer_reviews.author: dp27

customer_reviews.title: under the sea GREAT TOY
customer_reviews.text: Grand daughter loves this toy also, she is an undersea diver now!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a fun pool toy
customer_reviews.text: This is a fun pool toy, but this doe not sink to the bottom. My kids just played with them by the pool side. Still fun.
customer_reviews.author: Angela K.

customer_reviews.title: We all float down here.
customer_reviews.text: Could be a fun pool toy, but sadly, it floats.
customer_reviews.author: Frecklesotool

customer_reviews.title: My son loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my son as a reward for swimming lessons. He loves it and uses it all the time in the bath.
customer_reviews.author: Rochelle

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Game for Parties or Hot days at the Pool
customer_reviews.text: When I bought this I thought it was going to be for Birthdays only, but the kids play with it every time they go in the pool, it never gets old to them. My children are 2,5 and 8 and love this game!
customer_reviews.author: Larex Croft

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fun backyard game for a 3 year-old to play with in his kiddie pool. Light-weight and encourages creativity.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Sonic

customer_reviews.title: A great dive toy
customer_reviews.text: A great dive toy! My son loves it. Lost the pieces pretty quickly but it was fun while it lasted!
customer_reviews.author: redbuttons

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: 5 year old daughter loved this for the pool. Her and her friends played with it constantly.
customer_reviews.author: Audra12

customer_reviews.title: The hit of the pool this summer!
customer_reviews.text: This treasure chest was the star at our neighborhood pool this summer. Every time we brought it out the other kids would flock towards us and want to play. It would be nice, since the toy was so popular, if there could be a few more pieces of gold/silver or jewels. When there are just 6 pieces to dive for and 5 or 6 kids want to play, well, I guess perhaps we should buy two...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Got a lot of use by 2 and 5 year boys.
customer_reviews.text: My 2 grandsons love this for playing in and around our pool. The five year old loves to dive for them on the bottom of the shallow end, while his 2 yr. old brother deposits the "coins and jewels". They keep other diving treasure inside too. BTW, the chest doesn't sink unless it fills with water.
customer_reviews.author: Geraldine

customer_reviews.title: Priates and booty for our little cuties
customer_reviews.text: This is a simple use your imagination toy. Add other items to make it feel like an adventure. Make a treasure map hide the treasure. If you're looking for the practical application it helps to teach socialization skills.
customer_reviews.author: lookup and smile

customer_reviews.title: Great pool toy!
customer_reviews.text: Everything arrived in perfect condition - plenty of packaging for better or for worse. Would have liked that the treasure chest itself would sink to the bottom, but it was otherwise exactly what we were hoping for.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Johnston

customer_reviews.title: Kids love them in the pool
customer_reviews.text: Kids love them in the pool; thought they could share but that didn't work they each wanted their own so I ordered a second one.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Clendaniel

customer_reviews.title: 4 YEAR LOVES IT
customer_reviews.text: GREAT FOR LEARNING TO SWIM GETS CHILD TO GO UNDER WATER. THIS TAUGHT MY CHILD TO GO UNDER WATER STRENGHTING WHAT HE STARTED TO LEARN AT LESSONS. WASN'T THINKING ABOUT FEARS WAS HAVING FUN RETRIEVING COINS AND GEMS
customer_reviews.author: bunny

customer_reviews.title: Great pool tou
customer_reviews.text: My kids and nieces, ages 1-8, love playing with this toy at the pool!
customer_reviews.author: Kelsie Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Fun pool toy
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my niece and nephew to play with in our INTEX pool. They love searching for treasure. The only drawback is the chest doesn't float so great.
customer_reviews.author: MELISSA

customer_reviews.title: The stuff that is supposed to sink sinks and the ...
customer_reviews.text: The stuff that is supposed to sink sinks and the chest holds the pieces while in transit. Not much else to say.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan S

customer_reviews.title: purchased for a friend
customer_reviews.text: purchased for a friend's daughter who loves to swim and had her birthday party at a pool. All of the kids played with it after presents were unwrapped. Fun toy!
customer_reviews.author: parentsof5

customer_reviews.title: Melissa & Doug disappointment!
customer_reviews.text: This is a really cute concept however do not buy! Unfortunately the treasure chest does not sit on pool floor nor floats really well either. My daughter loved the gems but they do not fit thru the slot. Warning the coins however will fit through the pool filter. After only two play dates the octopus paint is flaking off.
customer_reviews.author: GREG PYLES

customer_reviews.title: I just wish there were more coins, but my ...
customer_reviews.text: I just wish there were more coins, but my two year old loves putting the coins in the slot and throwing the gems.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Carter

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: My twins love this pool toy! Every time we bring t to the pool other kids are obsessed with it too!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor N.

customer_reviews.title: Great for younger ones
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 2yo since the Melissa and Doug was great for a 4yo but not so much for a younger kid. He loves it since he can use it as a piggy bank. It's also rugged enough to take to the pool and outdoors. He fills it with sand, water and its just overall well made
customer_reviews.author: jcab

customer_reviews.title: Undersea Treasure Hunt
customer_reviews.text: I really had no idea it was a game. I bought it as a cake topper for my grandson's 3rd birthday and put coins and jewels on top spread out. It worked great. My grandson now plays with it.
customer_reviews.author: Teacher's aide

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The kids loved it and it held up very well.
customer_reviews.author: Retired

customer_reviews.title: Did not work as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: The treasure chest does not stay on the bottom of the pool, but actual ends up floating and getting into the water intake for the pump, causing the outlet to become blocked and stopping water from reaching the pump and filter. My grandchildren were greatly disappointed as the coin would not stay in the chest because the chest would float. I would not recommend this item for what it is intended.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Melissa & Doug Undersea Treasure Hunt
product_meta.description:
Splash into the deep for an exciting underwater treasure hunt! Four coins and two giant gems are the "booty" in this swashbuckling pool adventure. Be the first to slot them into the floating treasure chest to win . . . or use the included game ideas to inspire hours of variety and fun.

BRAND STORY
By

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
From classic wooden toys to crafts, pretend play, and games, Melissa & Doug products provide a launch pad to ignite imagination and a sense of wonder in all children so they can discover themselves, their passions, and their purpose. 

Since the company’s founding more than 25 years ago, Melissa & Doug has consistently delivered innovative products that inspire open-ended thinking, encourage kids to see new possibilities, and offer Countless Ways to Play. It’s part of a bigger vision to Take Back Childhood. Because by giving children a true childhood with the space and freedom to explore their world, we give them a path to realizing their full potential!

See more
feature_bullets: An exciting sinker game to add a splash of adventure to pool time
Includes six treasure-shaped sinkers and a floating treasure chest
Encourages gross motor skills, hand-eye coordination and water confidence
Includes play ideas for a variety of games in and out of the water
Sturdy plastic construction and fade-resistant colors stand up to chlorine and sun exposure

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
